title: BookInstance list page
summary: Next we'll implement our list of all book copies (BookInstance) in the library. This page needs to include the title of the Book associated with each BookInstance (linked to its detail page) along with other information in the BookInstance model, including the status, imprint, and unique id of each copy. The unique id text should be linked to the BookInstance detail page.

parents.title: Express Tutorial Part 5: Displaying library data

pageTitle: BookInstance list page - Learn web development | MDN
